thread.title: BSF Recruitment 2017 Assistant Commandant (15 Vacancies)

author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: BSF Recruitment 2017 Assistant Commandant (15 Vacancies)
text:
Pre revised PB-3 ₹ 15600 – 39100 + GP ₹ 5400/- Assistant Commandant (Electrical) Pre revised PB-3 ₹ 15600 – 39100 + GP ₹ 5400/- 
Educational Qualifications: 
Assistant Commandant (Works) -> Degree in Civil Engineering from a recognized University or Institution. 
Assistant Commandant (Electrical) -> Degree in Electrical Engineering from a recognized University or Institution. 
Application Fee: A Demand Draft (DD) / Postal Order for ₹ 400/- as examination fee in favour of the addressee to whom the application is addressed, payable at respective SBI/ Post Office at the location or nearby station. However, the fee is exempted for all Women candidates and candidates belonging to Scheduled Caste (SC) & BSF Candidates. 
Selection Process: Written Examination, Physical Standard Test (PST), Physical Efficiency Test (PET), Interview and Medical Examination. 
How to Apply: Application duly filled up in the given format may be sent to any one of the following addresses nearest to the candidate within 30 days   advertisement in the employment news (i.e. Last date will be 10/04/2017 ) and candidates belonging to far flung areas be sent within 45 days   advertisement   March 2017 Issue. S/No.
